# CameraFrameProvider.CameraRectification

**Enumeration**

Enumeration of possible camera rectification types.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CameraRectification
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CameraFrameProvider.CameraRectification.mono**: Mono camera rectification.
- **CameraFrameProvider.CameraRectification.stereoCorrected**: Stereo corrected camera rectification.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of CameraFrameProvider.CameraRectification.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
